House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00047
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE PROTECTION OF WHISTLEBLOWERS ENSURING THEIR SECURITY AND PROVIDING BENEFITS FOR THEIR WELFARE
SHORT TITLE : Whistleblower Protection Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Provides for a reward system to benefit the whistleblowers, protection against liabilities, security, protection of records against inappropriate disclosures, and assurance against discrimination or retaliatory actions in the workplace.
